/usr/bin/c++  -O3 -DNDEBUG   CMakeFiles/SimpleRecord.dir/main.cpp.o  -o SimpleRecord  -Wl,-rpath,/home/dji-tello/catkin_ws/build_isolated/pangolin/devel ../../libpango_display.so ../../libpango_video.so ../../libpango_windowing.so ../../libpango_opengl.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLEW.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOpenGL.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLX.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLU.so ../../libpango_vars.so ../../libpango_image.so ../../libpango_packetstream.so ../../libpango_core.so -lrt -lpthread
